# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/darwin-arm64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/rich/repr.py
@source-hash: e4c64966638d802e
@generated: 2026-02-09T17:59:19Z

## Primary Purpose
Rich library module providing automatic `__repr__` generation from `__rich_repr__` methods. Enables classes to define structured representation data that can be automatically converted to string representations in both standard function-call format and angular bracket format.

## Core Components

### Type Definitions (L16-21)
- `T` - Generic type variable for class decoration
- `Result` / `RichReprResult` - Type alias for iterables yielding representation elements (bare values, tuples with keys/values/defaults)

### Exception Class
- `ReprError` (L23-24) - Custom exception for repr generation failures

### Main Decorator Functions

#### `auto()` (L27-101)
Primary class decorator with two usage patterns:
- Direct decoration: `@auto` 
- Parameterized: `@auto(angular=True)`

**Key inner functions:**
- `auto_repr()` (L43-66) - Generates `__repr__` string from `__rich_repr__` data
  - Handles positional args, named args with defaults, and angular vs parenthetical formatting
- `auto_rich_repr()` (L68-86) - Auto-generates `__rich_repr__` by inspecting `__init__` signature
  - Yields parameter values based on parameter kinds (positional-only, keyword, etc.)

**Behavior:**
- If class lacks `__rich_repr__`, creates one automatically from `__init__` parameters
- Always replaces `__repr__` with generated version
- Supports angular bracket format (`<ClassName ...>`) vs function call format (`ClassName(...)`)

#### `rich_repr()` (L104-120)
Alias decorator that delegates to `auto()` - provides alternative naming for the same functionality.

## Dependencies
- `inspect` - For signature introspection in auto-generation
- `functools.partial` - For parameterized decorator pattern
- Standard typing imports for type annotations

## Key Patterns
- Overloaded function signatures to support both direct and parameterized decoration
- Partial function application for decorator factories
- Dynamic attribute assignment to modify class behavior
- Generator-based representation protocol using yield statements

## Demo Code (L123-149)
Example usage showing standard vs angular representation formats, including Rich console integration for pretty-printing at different widths.
